column4: Are there any programs for Linux like "Royal TS" http://code4ward.net/main/RoyalTS/Download.aspx?
but in a single window?  have to manage a lot of windows servers/boxes.  I really like the ability to do that from one tabbed window, guess that would be the main feature I'm looking for :)
i personally use teamviewer, it is cross platform and works pretty well
